name: send_whatsapp_resource
description: Call this tool whenever the user agrees to receive information, asks for a Zoom link, or wants to schedule a meeting. Do not just say you sent it; you must trigger this tool.

resource_type.description: The specific type of resource the user requested.

user_phone.description: The user's phone number as strictly E.164 format (e.g. +569...). If not available in context, ask for it.
